chatbot.evidence: The complaint mentions TOBI, a robot, who is not helpful.
chatbot.description: The chatbot TOBI is not providing assistance.
chatbot.suggestion: Improve the chatbot's ability to provide helpful assistance.

complaint.description: The customer has not received their order from the VodaBucks store since 19 August 2021.
complaint.suggestion: Resolve the delivery issue and ensure timely delivery of orders.

meta.review_title: I've ordered stuff from the VodaBucks store on 19 August 2021 and still not received it - if you phone, you are referred to TOBI (a robot) who is obviously of no assistance at all!!!!.
